name: purple.
description:
Purple is a game where you play as a little black square. You can't jump, which makes it partially a puzzle game as well. Otherwise, the goal is to figure out and conquer the controls.
Engine: Clickteam Fusion 2.5
Playtime: Roughly 22 minutes
Levels: 60
All music by Sanixels. (Direction, Gone)
If you did enjoy this game, please consider sharing it, it really helps.
Leave any bugs you encountered in the comments.
My best: 19m 58s
#Platformer #Indie
